name: ragemp-mango
author: 5exyGuy (AurÄ—jus Remeika), wlk (https://github.com/kkwlkk)
description: A decorator-driven TypeScript framework for RageMP multiplayer game servers. Port of the original altv-mango framework.

scripts.publish: pnpm run build --force && pnpm run types --force && pnpm publish --access public --filter "@ragemp-mango/core" --filter "@ragemp-mango/server" --filter "@ragemp-mango/client" --filter "@ragemp-mango/webview"
